hoda wachanayak eliyata panna.e thamayi “lingika nidahasa”.ohoma nidahasak thiyana kota oka sadacharawath widihatama pawichchi wenawa kiyala oba kiyana kathawa mama poddakwath piliganne na.oya wachanayenma thiyenne ayatha lingika sabadathawalata thiyana asimanthika nidahasa.oba kiyana kathawa eka athakata aaththa.eka thamayi batahira ratawala kama aparada wennema nahayi kiyana eka.eka aaththa wenne e ratawal wala ganunta,lamayinta oya aparada kochchara unath owa harima samanya dewal kiya sithana eka.sobawika dewal kiya sithana eka.ithin ehema hithana demawpiyan sitina batahira ratawala janathawa polosi gane usawi gane rasthiyadu wenne na.owani da wartha wenneth na.oya wani thirisan chinthanayak pawathina rata wal wala janathawata oba kiyanawa wage owa prashna neme.onama rataka janathawa 100%k hadanna ba.karanna puluwan oya kama aparada palanaya karana eka witharayi.anika mama kisima thanaka kiwwe na lankawe kama aparada nowenawayi kiyala.ada kale oya aparada nowena loke kisima ratak aathayi kiya ma sithanne na.lankawath pirihemin yanne.namuth oba kade yana batahira ratawal tharam lankawa thama pirihela na.mahamerak wani prashnaya wasa podi gal kata wani prashna mathu kalata wadak natha.lankawa winasha wela thibenam eka welath thiyenne obage batahira ratawal wana wisa lankawe modayin waladagannata yamen.aluthma madya wartha walata anuwa lokaye wadiyenma nil chithrapata hadana rata eksath rajadaniya.mekada mahaloku shishtathwaya.hadi garoppu walin kaka tayi kot aandata mokada owa yatin thiyenne maha thirisan samajayak.pitata pennana shishtathwayakin wadak natha.sudujathikayange shishtathwaya sudu krim ga lassanata ayisin kala balu wasuru menya.oba sithana pathana ratawa ma mawithayata path karayi.oba math samaga wihilu karanawawathda?
